talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>I'm sure that the statue of Mipha on the
promontory that looks down upon us is
very relieved as well.
I must go up there later to offer my thanks
for her kind protection.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:LaughS_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>To think that my daughter was chosen to join the
ruins-investigation group...<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:0:2:2:5000>I'll have to pay her just a quick little visit later...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's dark now. <sp:5:0:0>Please be careful out on
the road.

As late as it is, Prince Sidon is still
working diligently.<sp:5:1:0> I am so grateful
for his selfless courage.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Work>I must fulfill my duty by protecting him
from all danger!
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Good morning, Link!<sp:5:0:0> If you have a
question, I will do my best to provide
an answer!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Prince Sidon is busily purifying the water
that was sullied by the sludge. 

It is all thanks to his incredible ability that
the domain has been spared from being
buried by that dreadful stuff.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_00>Yet he is unable to cease his work, lest we
lose our footing and fall to ruin.

If only I had that same power to control
the flow of water, I could be of some use
to our brave prince.
talk0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>How nice to see you at this hour, Link!<sp:5:0:0>
If you have a question, I will do my best
to provide an answer!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Prince Sidon cannot move from this place.


But worry not. I swear I will protect him.
talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:LaughS_01>Oh, it seems I got a little carried away
chatting with you. I will return to guarding
Prince Sidon shortly.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Our prince cannot leave this place, but
worry not! <sp:5:0:0>I swear that I will protect him
with my very life.
talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's dark now. <sp:5:0:0>Please be careful out on
the road.

As late as it is, Prince Sidon is also still
working diligently.<sp:5:1:0> I am so grateful for
his selfless courage.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Work>I must fulfill my duty by protecting him
from all danger!
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>You will find him over there,<sp:5:1:0> intently
focused on his important work.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Is there anything else you would like to
ask me about?
talk0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>You will find him over there,<sp:5:1:0> intently
focused on his important work.
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Oh, oops... I hope you did not hear me talking
to myself.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0100>Well, you see, my daughter, Dunma, was
selected for the ruins-investigation team!
It is quite the honor.
talk0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I am certain that if Prince Sidon knew you
were here, he would be overjoyed to see
you, Link!
Now then, <sp:5:1:0>please go and see him
right away!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_01>She is protecting <clr:0000>Jiahto<clr:ffff> the historian
over at <clr:0000>Toto Lake<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>All by her lonesome,
no less!
She earned this honor for her part in
clearing out the sludge in the domain.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>She is practically a child still, not even in
the triple digits, yet look what she has
accomplished.<sp:5:0:0> I am so proud!
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>I am overjoyed to see you alive and well,
Link!<sp:5:1:0> Prince Sidon was beside himself
with worry.
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Speaking of overwhelming concern, I wonder how
my daughter, Dunma, is faring. She is remarkably
competent, but I cannot help but worry... Hm... <sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>
<sp:0:2:2:6400>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0><sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_01>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Please forgive my rudeness.
I was lost in thought for a moment there.<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I am overjoyed to see you alive and well,
Link!<sp:5:1:0> Prince Sidon was beside himself
with worry.
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Speaking of overwhelming concern, I wonder how
my daughter, Dunma, is faring. <sp:5:0:0>She is remarkably
competent, but I cannot help but worry...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Oh! My apologies! I did not notice
you there.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have a question, I will do my best
to provide an answer!
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Link!<sp:5:0:0> If you have a question, I will do my
best to provide an answer!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>You did it!


To think that everyone is safe and you
successfully protected our water source!
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>I am certain that Mipha is relieved as
well, even as she looks down upon us
from her statue on the promontory.
I think I'll go up there later to give my
thanks to her.
talk2013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>If my daughter becomes captain, we must hold a
massive parade to celebrate!<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Oh! I mean... <sp:5:0:0>It is nothing.<sp:5:1:0> I did not say
a thing.

All right! I must now return my full
attention to guard duty!
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>I wonder if Dunma is working diligently...<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:0:2:2:5000>Perhaps I should pay her just a quick little
visit later...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Link!<sp:5:0:0> Is there anything else you would like
to know?
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It is so nice to see you, Link! <sp:5:1:0>Welcome!


Are you looking for Prince Sidon?<sp:5:1:0>
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>It has been some time since I have seen
Prince Sidon and Lady Yona chatting.

They make such a handsome couple!
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>I hear that he went out on his own to
investigate the sludge and the ruins
that fell from the sky.
That would normally be the work of a
soldier.<sp:5:1:0> I am humbled by his bravery
and devotion.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>I am told that while King Dorephan is
away, <sp:5:0:0>the throne room is being used as
a place of refuge for the children to play.
His greatness truly knows no bounds.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you, Link! <sp:5:1:0>Once again, peace has
returned to the domain!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Furthermore, although this is admittedly
more of a personal matter...

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>my daughter, Dunma, did a fantastic job
of protecting Jiahto!

<sp:0:2:2:5000>I believe this means she has a good chance of
becoming the next captain of the guard!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm.<sp:5:0:0> The land of the sky fish, you say?
I have <sp:5:0:0>not heard of such a thing.<sp:5:1:0>
However...
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Many mysterious islands have appeared in
the sky since the Upheaval.

It is already so unusual, I would not be
surprised if one or two of them had fish.<sp:5:0:0>
Perhaps more!
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Or maybe it is not referring to real fish,
but rather something in the <clr:0000>shape of
a fish<clr:ffff>?
Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>I really haven't the faintest.
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_00>We will protect Lady Yona! I swear it!


Link! Look after Prince Sidon!
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_01>With the sludge sullying all of the water it
touches, this is the last remaining source
of clean water for the domain.
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>Look. Can you see it?<sp:5:0:0> That promontory...
<sp:5:0:0>Our statue of Mipha, the Zora Champion,
is there.
That's why it is called Mipha Court.


Please, protect us in our time of need...<sp:5:1:0>
That is the prayer that my heart extends
in the presence of Mipha's statue.
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome!<sp:5:1:0>


Do you need something from
Prince Sidon?
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you, Link!


Because of you, Prince Sidon was able to
further his investigation!

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_01>I will not drop my guard just yet, <sp:5:0:0>but I
know in my heart that the future of the
Zora is bright!
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>The land of the sky fish...<sp:5:1:0> I really have no
idea what that could be referring to.

Perhaps somewhere on the mysterious
islands floating in the sky, there is a spot
with lots of fish?
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>Or maybe that is not referring to real fish,
but rather something in the <clr:0000>shape of
a fish<clr:ffff>?
Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>I really haven't the faintest.
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>Huh. It almost looks like they are having
an argument!

Haha, no. My imagination must be playing
tricks on me!
talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Leave Lady Yona to us! You must protect
Prince Sidon!
0012: The land of the sky fish?
talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>We are elated to see Prince Sidon on the
move again!

We are not out of danger just yet, but...<sp:5:0:0>
I know in my heart that the future of the
Zora is bright!
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>To think that everyone is safe and you
successfully protected our water source!
You are one of a kind, Link!
